metadata.title: CVE-2024-26829 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: ir_toy: fix a memleak in irtoy_txWhen irtoy_command fails, buf should be freed since it is allocated byirtoy_tx, or there is a memleak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
